com.google.gcloud.datastore

Interface DatastoreReader

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DatastoreReaderWriter, DatastoreService, Transaction
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatastoreHelper

    public interface DatastoreReader
    An interface to represent Google Cloud Datastore read operations.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Iterator<Entity> get(Key... key)
      Returns an Entity for each given Key that exists in the Datastore.
      Entity get(Key key)
      Returns an Entity for the given Key or null if does not exists.
      <T> QueryResult<T> run(Query<T> query)
      Submit a Query and returns its result.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        Entity get(Key key)
        Returns an Entity for the given Key or null if does not exists.
        Throws:
        DatastoreServiceException - upon failure.

      • get

        Iterator<Entity> get(Key... key)
        Returns an Entity for each given Key that exists in the Datastore. The order of the result is unspecified. Results are loaded lazily therefore it is possible to get a DatastoreServiceException from the returned Iterator's hasNext or next methods.
        Throws:
        DatastoreServiceException - upon failure.
        See Also:
        get(Key)

      • run

        <T> QueryResult<T> run(Query<T> query)
        Submit a Query and returns its result.
        Throws:
        DatastoreServiceException - upon failure.
